title: NUST retains standing among world’s top 400 varsities
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jun 23 (APP):The National University of Sciences and Technology (NUST) has proudly retained its position among the world’s top 400 universities, ranked 371 globally in the QS World University Rankings 2026.
This marks yet another year of NUST’s inclusion in the exclusive band of top-tier institutions worldwide — a distinction achieved by only two universities from Pakistan.
In the rigorous and competitive ranking exercise involving hundreds of universities from around the world, NUST’s consistent presence in the top 400 testifies to its sustained academic excellence, impactful research, global collaborations, and growing reputation among international academia and employers. With its coveted global standing, NUST continues to stand out as a national powerhouse of higher education and innovation in the country and beyond.
